extendedInfo.description: Join Mickey on a brand new adventure in Disneyâs most popular mobile game franchise!Where's My Mickey? introduces a whole new world of life-like physics-based gameplay with stimulating weather mechanics and humorous animations. Immerse yourself in the ultimate mobile gaming experience as you watch funny episodes while solving challenging puzzles! Tap, swipe, and swirl to help Mickey collect water and complete each story. Every drop counts! â¢ Original Episodes â Explore up to 5 unique episodes with surprising and witty scenarios! Watch how each story unfolds and ends as you play through individual level packs!â¢ Brand New Weather Mechanics â Use wind, clouds and rain to maneuver through 100+ levels filled with fun challenges!â¢ A Whole New Look â A classic Mickey art-style with a contemporary touch, inspired by Disney Channelâs new series of Mickey Cartoons!â¢ Collectibles and Bonus Levels â Help Pluto look for hidden collectibles to unlock more bonus puzzles!â¢ Featuring Mickey and Friends â Discover more hilarious episodes and new friends, beginning with Goofy!Try 6 Goofy puzzles for FREE and unlock the remaining episodes for a small additional price!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Very enjoyable addition to the series
reviews.comment: Mickey does not disappoint. The cartoons are funny and the interlude sketches are great. I highly recommend this game if you enjoy the other Where\'s My games.
reviews.author: Mark Symmonds

reviews.title: Fun for adults and kids
reviews.comment: Game is excellent for kids and adults, a great follow on to Where\'s my water, well done Disney.  Graphics (cartoons) are great.
reviews.author: Darren van Eyssen

reviews.title: No good so far
reviews.comment: I cannot download I\'ve tried more then a dozen times. I don\'t want my money back I just want to play the game
reviews.author: AandJ Alvarez

reviews.title: Wont download
reviews.comment: I loved the free version but I buy the full thing and it gives me an error message at 95% saying it can\'t download even after trying to download for 30 minutes
reviews.author: Sara Gott

reviews.title: Levels
reviews.comment: Only 3 episodes when they say it over 100 levels. 1.99 plus another 99\302\242  for more. That\'s a rip off...
reviews.author: Janet Mendoza

reviews.title: Same as the rest.
reviews.comment: You get 3 episodes and then they want to charge another 0.99 cents for 2 additional ones? Frustrating.
reviews.author: Paul Eicher

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Keeps kicking me out and doesn\'t let me play, if I could play I would give it more stars. Please fix this problem.
reviews.author: Jack Smith

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: I like Where\'s My Water more, but this is almost as good. It adds some new mechanics and thitmus. It\'s worth $2.
reviews.author: Truk Stich

reviews.title: In app purchase levels
reviews.comment: You\'re not buying a full  game, only three of five available levels; the two extra levels need to be purchased separately. With all sound muted, you still get annoying music during the cut scenes. Not as good as water or perry.
reviews.author: Michael Jugan

reviews.title: TOTEL RIP-OFF!!!
reviews.comment: There is only 3 level packs when they say there is over 100.
reviews.author: Colin Eccher

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s 3
reviews.comment: After about 95% it says it came download it. Invalid error or something like that.
reviews.author: Laura Chittum

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: It says file package error after three hours of trying to download it. :( 99\302\242 wasted.
reviews.author: Amy Kloud

reviews.title: Great esp. for kids!
reviews.comment: I personally prefer the Water & Perry apps but the Mickey & Goofy games are fun & challenging and unlike the other apps, there is a known high score to work towards. The graphics are great & look out for the secret levels!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Can\'t play a full level without an add popping up and pauseing the game.
reviews.author: ernie young

reviews.title: Fun..but
reviews.comment: It\'s really fun like the rest of the series. But you are only paying for three of the five episodes. It\'s another 99 cents for the last two!
reviews.author: Laken Neil

reviews.title: Super confused
reviews.comment: Ok, so I finished all of the levels the other day and then today when I went to purchase Van Goofy and Ship-wrecked all of my progress was gone. What\'s up with that???
reviews.author: Nelly Jones

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: Now it doesn\'t shutdown my phone.
reviews.author: wilson richardson

reviews.title: Another payment.
reviews.comment: When I downloaded this game I thought that it will be just a payment, but if you want to play the chapters with Goofy you must to buy them . Disappointing.
reviews.author: Danylame Dany

reviews.title: In app purchase
reviews.comment: I purchased the goofy level and now I am being charged double fees I would like a refund
reviews.author: Michael Hardy

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Hardly any episodes.you have to keep  paying to  get more episodes.
reviews.author: emily dowey
